thread.title: Beverali Fifield
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Beverali Fifield

author: Beverali Fifield
title: Beverali Fifield
text:
I was greeted with a friendly smile, asking what can she do to help me. The entire meeting was extremely friendly and knowledgeable. Deb answered all my questions. I have never rented a Storage Unit, so I had a lot of questions. Deb was very professional and again answered all my questions.
If you would like additional questions answered please contact me.
